Furthermore, the caption misses an opportunity to describe the bridge itself—an essential framing element—which could be an illuminated, multi-arched stone bridge, adding significant architectural context. A more accurate caption would frame the video as a dynamic interplay between the moving subjects (the boats) and the iconic, static environment (Notre Dame and the riverbanks), rather than dismissing the boats' importance.
